messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: Reflecting past achievements from 2010 to 2015 and promises for 2015 to 2020 in areas such as cutting deficit, tax cuts, health budget, education spending, and support for school children.

messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Paul Childs
messages.content: Paul is a committed campaigner and will work tirelessly for Liverpool. Paul will fight for more local jobs and apprenticeships. Paul will fight to protect Liverpool’s green spaces from developers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 2010-2015: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household. 2015-2020: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
2010-2015: Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. 2015-2020: Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
2010-2015: Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. 2015-2020: Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.
2010-2015: Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids. 2015-2020: Protect education spending from cradle to college.
Paul will fight for more local jobs and apprenticeships.
Paul will fight to protect Liverpool’s green spaces from developers.
